description: From Middle French transplantation, from transplanter (“to transplant”) + -ation (suffix indicating an action or process).

entries.meaning: The resettlement of a group of people.

definitionGroups.group: A surgical operation in which an organ is moved from a donor to a recipient; an organ transplant.

entries.meaning: The medicosurgical specialty (field) concerned with such operations.
A particular instance of such an operation (a single procedure): a transplant.
The uprooting of a tree and planting it in a new location.
